## Project Timeline

  Phase = c("Draft Proposal", "Project Review", "Coding", "Webpage Construct"),
  Duration = c("Week 1-2", "Week 2-3", "Week 3-4", "Week 4-5"),
  Status = c("✅ Complete", "✅ Complete", "✅ Complete", "✅ Complete")
)

knitr::kable(timeline, format = "html", align = "lcc") |>
